trans-unit.source: A service contract that defines the methods that wrap the Message-oriented operation contracts exposed by <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract"></xref>.
Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Cancel message to an endpoint.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
An optional <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate, to be called when the send is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.
An <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.
Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Renew message to an endpoint.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
An optional <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate, to be called when the send is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.
An <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.
Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Renew message to an endpoint.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
An optional <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate, to be called when the send is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.
An <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.
Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Validate message to an endpoint.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
An optional <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate, to be called when the send is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.
An <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.
Sends a WS-Trust Cancel message to an endpoint.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> that represents the STS response.

Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginCancel(System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref>.
A reference to the outstanding asynchronous send request.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> that represents the STS response.

Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginIssue(System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref>.
A reference to the outstanding asynchronous send request.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> that represents the STS response.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the token issued by the STS.

Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginRenew(System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref>.
A reference to the outstanding asynchronous send request.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> that represents the STS response.

Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginValidate(System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref>.
A reference to the outstanding asynchronous send request.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> that represents the STS response.
Sends a WS-Trust Issue message to an endpoint STS.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the token issued by the STS.
Sends a WS-Trust Issue message to an endpoint STS.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> that represents the response from the STS.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the token issued by the STS.
Sends a WS-Trust Renew message to an endpoint.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> that represents the STS response.
Sends a WS-Trust Validate message to an endpoint.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> that represents the request to the STS.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> that represents the STS response.
